Fairytale romance will encapsulate your small ceremony by this picture-perfect lily pond with overhead twinkling lights. Brides planning tropical daytime or sunset weddings will love the exotic Coconut Grove, while brides envisioning sunset waterside weddings will love Ford’s Riverside Lawn. Finally, say your “I-do’s” or hold your reception by the majestic Mysore Fig Tree, the ultimate symbol of family and strength. With its sprawling roots and incredible breadth, it will be the perfect visual and symbolic backdrop to your Big Day. However you choose to execute your vision at the Estates, this enchanting property will leave you with a feeling of romance and beauty that will stay with you forever. How do I use my membership at Edison Ford? When you receive your membership packet, peel off your cards.
